Source.Name: hyprland-protocols
Source.Description: Wayland protocol extensions for Hyprland. This repository exists in an effort to bridge the gap between Hyprland and KDE/Gnome's functionality. Since wlr-protocols is closed for new submissions, and wayland-protocols is very slow with changes, this repo will hold protocols used by Hyprland to bridge the aforementioned gap.
